name: Valley View
description:
First ever game I've released. Teehee! Please be mindful that this was a short throwaway project, so some details may be messy.

Synopsis:

You have been wanting to break up with your boyfriend for awhile, but when he starts acting strange you can't help but see where it leads.

CONTENT WARNINGS:

Body Horror, Flashing Imagery, Death, Slightly Suggestive (It's like one line), Mentions of Abusive Behaviour
